Love.title: Eternal Love
Love.quote: Love is not an emotion, it's your very existence.
Love.author: Rumi

Love.title: Woods in Silence
Love.quote: The woods are lovely, dark, and deep, But I have promises to keep, And miles to go before I sleep, And miles to go before I sleep.
Love.author: Robert Frost

Love.title: Whispers of the Heart
Love.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
Love.author: Nicholas Sparks

Poem.title: Woods in Silence
Poem.quote: The woods are lovely, dark, and deep But I have promises to keep, And miles to go before I sleep And miles to go before I sleep.
Poem.author: Robert Frost

Poem.title: Dancing Daffodils
Poem.quote: I wandered lonely as a cloud, That floats on high o'er vales and hills...
Poem.author: William Wordsworth

Poem.title: Fools in love
Poem.quote: A boy was dating a girl who always hurt him. One day, she broke up with him and told him, 'I don't ever want to see you again.' A few months later, the girl had a change of heart. She realized that she loved the boy, so she went back and said to him, 'Give me just one more chance. I love and I need you. I promise that I will never hurt you again.' But the boy just laughed and said to her, 'Only a fool would take back someone who hurt them so much.' The girl felt hopeless and began to cry, but the boy put his arms around her, held her tightly and said, '...and I am one of those fools.'
Poem.author: Sexy Shana

Nature.title: Nature's Bounty
Nature.quote: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
Nature.author: John Muir

Nature.title: Wisdom of the Wild
Nature.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
Nature.author: Albert Einstein

Motivation.title: Believe in Yourself
Motivation.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Motivation.title: Seize the Day
Motivation.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
Motivation.author: Steve Jobs

Life.title: Simplicity of Life
Life.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Life.author: Confucius

Life.title: Life's Unpredictable Journey
Life.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Life.author: John Lennon
